game_name: It's not a bug, it's a feature
description: Choose your dev branch (Frontend, Mobile, or Backend) and defend against falling bugs! Shoot bugs to convert them into features, collect features to launch production rockets, and destroy the Product Owner. Progress through difficulty levels (Practicante/Intern â†’ 10X Engineer) as you launch more rockets. Manage your weapon's overheat system and avoid bugs reaching the bottom. Features: Matrix-style hacker background, 8-bit music that speeds up with difficulty, lives system, and leaderboard with high scores. EASTER EGG: If you press the J button 5 times while selecting your player, something familiar will play...
